long_description: Love the outdoors but hate giving up creature comforts? The REI Big Air Chair saves the day with an inflatable design that's easy to take on all your adventures. Inflatable design includes 1-way air valve and dual-action hand pump that lets you fully inflate the chair in less than 50 pumps. Rubber feet protect the aluminum/steel frame from rocky terrain; they also prevent the chair frame from scratching hardwood floors. Durable polyester fabric cover protects inner air pad; side sleeves store books, magazines and snacks for a perfect afternoon of lounging. REI Big Air Chair includes a stuff sack for easy storing and transport.
short_description: Love the outdoors but hate giving up creature comforts? The REI Big Air Chair saves the day with an inflatable design that's easy to take on all your adventures.
